name: Speed Potion
description: A potion that grants increased speed to the drinker for a short duration.
looks: The potion is a clear vial filled with a sparkling, silver liquid.

name: Speed Boots
description: Boots that enhance the speed of the wearer.
looks: The boots are made of a sleek, black material and have neon blue accents.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the magic spell to cast fireball.
looks: The scroll is made of ancient parchment with intricate symbols and runes inscribed on it.

special_effects.fireball: Allows the user to cast a fireball spell.

name: Strength Potion
description: A potion that temporarily boosts the drinker's strength and melee damage.
looks: The potion is a vibrant red color, swirling with energy.

name: Ice Staff
description: A staff made of ice that can unleash freezing spells.
looks: The staff is made entirely of ice and has a frosty appearance.

special_weapon_skills.staff_mastery: Increases damage and accuracy with staves.

special_effects.chill_effect: Has a chance to freeze enemies upon hit.

name: Speed Elixir
description: An elixir that enhances the user's speed and movement abilities for a limited time.
looks: A small glass bottle filled with a glowing, purple liquid.

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A cloak that grants the wearer temporary invisibility.
looks: This cloak is made of a shimmering, silver fabric that seems to blend into the surroundings.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants temporary invisibility to the wearer.

name: Fire Essence
description: A bottle of concentrated fire essence.
looks: The bottle is made of glass and contains a swirling liquid that glows with a fiery red color.

name: Berserker Axe
description: A powerful, two-handed axe that enhances the user's physical damage.
looks: The axe has a thick, long handle made of sturdy oak, with a large, razor-sharp blade at the end. The blade is covered in dried blood stains, with a faint red glow emanating from it.

special_weapon_skills.axe_mastery: Grants a bonus to axe skill

special_effects.berserker_rage: When the user's health drops below 50%, their attack speed and damage are significantly increased for a short duration.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: A magical cloak that grants the wearer invisibility.
looks: The cloak is made of a shimmering, translucent fabric that seems to blend with the surroundings.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants the wearer the ability to turn invisible for a limited time.
